title: How to Make Perfect Iced Tea

steps.title: Put English breakfast tea bags into the glass container and make tea.
steps.content: Put English breakfast tea bags into the glass container and make tea.

steps.title: When the tea is fairly strong, pick out the tea bags and throw them away.
steps.content: When the tea is fairly strong, pick out the tea bags and throw them away.

steps.title: Squeeze in the tiny splash of Lemon juice from a bottle or a fresh lemon.
steps.content: Squeeze in the tiny splash of Lemon juice from a bottle or a fresh lemon.

steps.title: Leave in the fridge for about an hour on a very cold setting.
steps.content: Leave in the fridge for about an hour on a very cold setting.

steps.title: Chop up the mint into tiny pieces and scrape into the tea.
steps.content: Chop up the mint into tiny pieces and scrape into the tea.

steps.title: Cut the thick quarter of a lemon into skinny slices and place on the glasses, saving one piece to put inside of the jug with the tea.
steps.content: Cut the thick quarter of a lemon into skinny slices and place on the glasses, saving one piece to put inside of the jug with the tea.

steps.title: Put in the fridge for another hour.
steps.content: Put in the fridge for another hour.
